title: Broken DVD player & Doors cd for a T205?
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: Broken DVD player & Doors cd for a T205?
posts.post_content: I have a DVD player that does not work anymore.  I will take any T205 for it. Maybe a tech wonk could fix it. I will also thrown in a scratched cd of the Doors "Waiting for the Sun", some of the songs don't play anymore. Thanks :)
